title: Windows 10 creaters update(1703, 1709) causing stuttering and fps drop in League?
body: So I've been experiencing fps drop and stuttering in the game right after I did my creators update(1703, 1709), fps legit stays the same on every graphic settings no matter it's very high or very low. I've heard it may have been caused by the bugs, issues and compatibility of win10 system and nvidia drivers or even the game itself. Does anyone else have been experiencing this problem since some changes in the new settings of the creaters update system doesn't totally solve the problem. And does anyone know If Microsoft, Nvidia, or Riot is working on a fix?

replies.body:
I have the same Problem because of this damn Win10 Update.
I am normally playing with 300 fps and now it drops to 10 etc screen freezing and so on.
I found a "fix" for this you need to go to the league of legends.exer rightclick go to compatiblity and choose Win XP Service Pack 3.
This will limit your FPS to 120~ but the drops etc will go away.

I think this is only a temp fix because how is it even possible that a fucking windoes update breaks so many games -.- and we need to start it as it would be windows XP LOL

Same. I use to have 300+ FPS and i just updated to 1709 this week.  Ever since the update my FPS has been between 80-100 and I will lag here and there in game.  Ping is always consistent and fps doesnt drop during lag....

It's happening to me too, but in overwatch. I haven't tried league or other games yet but I'm sure it's the same case. Been looking around the internet for ways to fix it but found none that have worked for me yet. Windows pls

I haven't heard any specific issues with that update except a previous issue preventing some mouse buttons from being used.  See if our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide might help out in this case by adjusting your pc settings and drivers, instead of specific in-game options.  Let me know if it helps.
